page.description: Replace line(s) of text at word position (1 line replaced if nlines ommitted).
page.syntax: New_String as C = *LINE_REPLACE(text as c,insert as c,line as n[,nlines as n])

argument.name: New_String
argument.description: The modified text containing line replacement(s).

argument.name: line
argument.description: The number of the first line to replace. Numeric

argument.name: nlines
argument.description: Optional. Default = 1. The number of lines to replace. Numeric

page.discussion: The *LINE_REPLACE() function replaces line(s) of text in a CR-LF delimited string.
page.example: lines = <<%str% #one #two #three #four #%str% ? *line_replace(lines, "THREE!!", 3) = one two THREE!! four ? *line_replace(lines,"TWO AND THREE", 2, 2) = one TWO AND THREE four
